Codeable - Denmark - Full Time - Remote

We're looking for a Ruby (on Rails) developer to help build and maintain our API.

Requirements: - EU timezone (so that our hours overlap as much as possible) - You know Ruby and Rails inside out - You need little guidance (i.e. see what needs to be done for yourself) - You strive for 100% test coverage - You're comfortable with daily deployments - You're obsessed with app performance

To apply, send an email to tomaz@codeable.io
